title: Fluctuate
lyrics:
I'll push back all my plans
'Cause you stayed up, Christ, I love it
And I'd write off every chance
That I’ve ever had with someone
In short this means the start
You switched my faith then phone off

Just sat there sifting through my demos

That, I’ve never had with someone



Why pass all the times?

Cause discipline's led me

Led me to you



Here's to the nights we'd come in

Have we lost all judgment?

And those dreams that we made

Would remind me of the ways

It was the nights I’d come in

And you were round mine singing

And you act out the lines with an arm to the skies



I pushed back all my plans

'Cause you waited up, Christ, I'm lovin' ya

And I’d write off every time

That I’ve ever had with someone

In short this means the start

You switched my faith then phone off

Just sat there sifting through my b-sides

That, I’ve never had with someone



Why pass all the time?

Then discipline's led me

They left me with you



Here's to the nights we'd come in

Have we lost all judgment?

And those dreams that we made

Would remind me of the ways

It was the nights of coming

And you were round mine buzzing

And you act out the lines with an arm to the skies



So pull the love over my eyes

Cause I fluctuate around you

If you’re a blessing in disguise

I did not realise

So pull the love over my eyes

Cause I fluctuate about you

If you’re a blessing in disguise

I did not realise

I did not realise



So here's to the nights we'd come in

Have I lost all judgment?

And those dreams that we made

They'd remind me of the ways

It was the nights I’d come in

And you were round mine singing

And you'd act out the lines with an arm up to the skies
